name: Gaziter's Cat Oven
description:
Here's the cat oven project that I've been working on on and off in my free time since graduating university! Check out Gaziter's twitter for more cute concepts like this one :D

Left click: spawn and drag
Right click: spawn and restart

Full breakdown can be found on my blog: https://wordpress.com/view/tsukeoni.wordpress.com
My goal here was to learn how to use software that I hadn't before, and to bulk up my technical art skills, so I used maya and unity instead of my usual 3ds max and UE4. I primarily learnt shaders and unity c#, but also dabbled in some animation and particle systems to add more life to the scene.
Music/sfx used are:
https://freesound.org/s/508110/
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/cute
